name: Varmintz Deluxe
summary: Help your Varmintz navigate 50 crazy levels avoiding eccentric enemies and odd obstacles along the way. Crossing a busy street is one thing, but going through suburbia, the wild west, and backwoods country is a different matter altogether!
info:
• 别名: 狸猫过街
